explains: adj. 第十五的；十五分之一的

sentences.en: He received a car on his fifteenth birthday.
sentences.cn: 他在十五岁生日时收到了一辆车。

sentences.en: They can push down the thirteenth partial and bring up the fifteenth and thereby change the sound of a clarinet into a French horn.
sentences.cn: 他们可以压低第十三分音，或者提高第十五分音，从而将单簧管的声音变成圆号的。

sentences.en: The number of extant manuscripts, however few, really does not allow scholars to infer how many ancient Latin manuscripts of a work survived to the ninth, the twelfth, or even the fifteenth century.
sentences.cn: 现存的手稿，不论数量多么少，也不能让学者推断一部作品的古代拉丁手稿有多少存活到了九、十二，甚至是十五世纪。
